languages.text: "И это, Лорд-капитан". {n}Исповедник смущенно скребет пальцем в проводах на затылке.{/n} "Знайте, что среди пустотников Простора о вас добрая слава идет. И у нас, и на других {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}кораблях{/g} вас чтут как верн{mf|ого|ую} слугу Его. Многих капитанов власть ослепляет, но не вас. И мы, пустотные волки, такое ценим".

"Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."
languages.original_text: "И это, Лорд-капитан". {n}Исповедник смущенно скребет пальцем в проводах на затылке.{/n} "Знайте, что среди пустотников Простора о вас добрая слава идет. И у нас, и на других {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}кораблях{/g} вас чтут как верн{mf|ого|ую} слугу Его. Многих капитанов власть ослепляет, но не вас. И мы, пустотные волки, такое ценим".

It's not just our ship — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."

"Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."

languages.text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Er kratzt sich verlegen an den Drähten an seinem Hinterkopf.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch nur wissen lassen, dass Raumfahrer in der gesamten Ausdehnung nur Gutes über Euch berichten. Aber nicht nur auf unserem Schiff ... {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}viele Crews dort draußen{/g} verehren Euch als {mf|Seinen treuen Diener|Seine treue Dienerin}. Captains sind nur allzu oft von der Macht geblendet, Ihr aber nicht. Wir Leerenwölfe respektieren das."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."

Aber nicht nur auf unserem Schiff ... viele Crews dort draußen verehren Euch als {mf|Seinen treuen Diener|Seine treue Dienerin}. Captains sind nur allzu oft von der Macht geblendet, Ihr aber nicht. Wir Leerenwölfe respektieren das."

"Lord Captain ..." {n}Er kratzt sich verlegen an den Drähten an seinem Hinterkopf.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch nur wissen lassen, dass Raumfahrer in der gesamten Ausdehnung nur Gutes über Euch berichten. Aber nicht nur auf unserem Schiff ... viele Crews dort draußen verehren Euch als {mf|Seinen treuen Diener|Seine treue Dienerin}. Captains sind nur allzu oft von der Macht geblendet, Ihr aber nicht. Wir Leerenwölfe respektieren das."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}D'un air penaud, il gratte les fils à l'arrière de sa tête.{/n} « Je voulais juste que vous sachiez que les cosmomarins de toutes les Étendues disent du bien de vous. Et pas uniquement ceux de notre {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}vaisseau{/g} ; de nombreux équipages vous reconnaissent comme {mf|Son|Sa} fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante}. Souvent, les capitaines sont aveuglés par le pouvoir, mais pas vous. Nous autres, les loups du cosmos, on respecte ça. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}D'un air penaud, il gratte les fils à l'arrière de sa tête.{/n} « Je voulais juste que vous sachiez que les cosmomarins de toutes les Étendues disent du bien de vous. Et pas uniquement ceux de notre vaisseau ; de nombreux équipages vous reconnaissent comme {mf|Son|Sa} fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante}. Souvent, les capitaines sont aveuglés par le pouvoir, mais pas vous. Nous autres, les loups du cosmos, on respecte ça. »

« {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}D'un air penaud, il gratte les fils à l'arrière de sa tête.{/n} « Je voulais juste que vous sachiez que les cosmomarins de toutes les Étendues disent du bien de vous. Et pas uniquement ceux de notre vaisseau ; de nombreux équipages vous reconnaissent comme {mf|Son|Sa} fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante}. Souvent, les capitaines sont aveuglés par le pouvoir, mais pas vous. Nous autres, les loups du cosmos, on respecte ça. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}Se rasca tímidamente los cables de la nuca.{/n} «Quería informarle de que los infantes del vacío de toda la Extensión hablan bien de usted. No solo en nuestra {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}nave{/g}, hay tripulaciones enteras que le honran como Su fiel sirvient{mf|e|a}. Muy a menudo, los capitanes se dejan cegar por el poder, pero no usted. Los lobos del vacío lo respetamos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}Se rasca tímidamente los cables de la nuca.{/n} «Quería informarle de que los infantes del vacío de toda la Extensión hablan bien de usted. No solo en nuestra nave, hay tripulaciones enteras que le honran como Su fiel sirvient{mf|e|a}. Muy a menudo, los capitanes se dejan cegar por el poder, pero no usted. Los lobos del vacío lo respetamos».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}彼は気まずげに後頭部の電線を掻いている。{/n}「エクスパンス全域のヴォイズマンがあなたを高く評価しているとお尻おきください。我々の{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}船{/g}だけでなく…あちこちにいる多くのクルーが、あなた主の忠実な従者だと称えています。権力に目が眩む船長は普通にいますが、あなたは違う。我らヴォイドウルフは、そのことに敬意を表する」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}彼は気まずげに後頭部の電線を掻いている。{/n}「エクスパンス全域のヴォイズマンがあなたを高く評価しているとお尻おきください。我々の船だけでなく…あちこちにいる多くのクルーが、あなた主の忠実な従者だと称えています。権力に目が眩む船長は普通にいますが、あなたは違う。我らヴォイドウルフは、そのことに敬意を表する」

languages.text: “舰长大人……”{n}他羞怯地抓着后脑勺的电线。{/n}“我只想告诉您，整个科罗努斯扩区的船员都在说您的好话。不仅仅只有我们的{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}船{/g}，还有许多其他船的船员，大家都尊称您为神皇的忠仆。很多时候，船长会被权力蒙蔽双眼，但您从来不会，我们这些虚空之狼非常尊重您这点。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……”{n}他羞怯地抓着后脑勺的电线。{/n}“我只想告诉您，整个科罗努斯扩区的船员都在说您的好话。不仅仅只有我们的船，还有许多其他船的船员，大家都尊称您为神皇的忠仆。很多时候，船长会被权力蒙蔽双眼，但您从来不会，我们这些虚空之狼非常尊重您这点。”
“舰长大人……”{n}他羞怯地抓着后脑勺的电线。{/n}“我只想告诉您，整个科罗努斯扩区的船员都在说您的好话。不仅仅只有我们的船，还有许多其他船的船员，大家都尊称您为神皇的忠仆。很多时候，船长会被权力蒙蔽双眼，但您从来不会，我们这些虚空之狼非常尊重您这点。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan." {n}Kafasının arkasındaki kabloları dalgın dalgın kaşıyor.{/n} "Enginlik'teki uçsuz erlerinin sizin hakkınızda yalnızca iyi şeyler söylediklerini bildirmek isterim. Yalnızca bizim {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}gemimiz{/g} değil, birçok geminin mürettebatı sizi O'nun inançlı ve onurlu bir hizmetkârı olarak görüyor. Güç, kaptanları sık sık kör edebilmekte ama siz öyle değilsiniz. Biz uçsuz kurtlarının buna saygısı sonsuzdur."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}He scratches the wires at the back of his head sheepishly.{/n} "I just want you to know that voidsmen across the Expanse have been saying good things about you. It's not just our {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}ship{/g} — many crews out there honour you as His faithful servant. All too often, captains are blinded by power, but not you. Us void wolves, we respect that."
